attributes.additional_details:
All existing streetlights should legally be required to have the reflectors replaced with more efficient version.

As most lights are a standardised design they should create a led fixture with integral glass lenses that can be quickly fitted without any modification.

This would improve both the quantity of useable light and reduce light pollution at the same time.

Light pollution is getting worse every year, all I see is a orange haze instead of the glorious stars.
